facts.seriesTitle: Population below international poverty line (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population living below the extreme poverty line was approximately 35.8 % in 1995.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children under 5 years of age who are moderately or severely stunted (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2012, 2.5 % of children under 5 years of age had stunted growth

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children under 5 years of age who are moderately or severely overweight
facts.fact_text: The share of overweight children under 5 years of age was approximately6.3 % in 2012.

facts.seriesTitle: Maternal mortality ratio
facts.fact_text: The maternal mortality ratio increased from 45 per 100,000 live births in 1990 to 48 per 100,000 live births in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Under-five mortality rate
facts.fact_text: The mortality rate of children under 5 years of age fell from 18.1 per 1,000 live births in 2000 to 16.6 per 1,000 live births in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Participation rate in organized learning (one year before the official primary entry age)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 95.95 % of children participated in pre-primary or primary education in the year prior to the official entrance age for primary school

facts.seriesTitle: Gender parity index for achievement in mathematics by the end of primary education
facts.fact_text: The gender parity index for achievement in mathematics at the end of primary education was 1.04 in 2015 , meaning 104.0 girls per 100 boys achieved at least a minimum proficiency level in mathematics.

facts.seriesTitle: Gender parity index for achievement in reading by the end of primary education
facts.fact_text: The gender parity index for achievement in reading at the end of primary education was 1.18 in 2015 , meaning 118.0 girls per 100 boys achieved at least a minimum proficiency level in reading.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of women aged 20-24 years who were married or in a union before age 18 (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2012, 7.5 % of women between 20 to 24 years of age reported having been married before their eighteenth birthday

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of seats held by women in national parliaments (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of seats held by women in single or lower houses of parliament increased from 11.11 % in 2000 to 16.67% in 2018.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with access to electricity (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population with access to electricity increased from 89.37 % in 2000 to 97.76% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, more than 95 % of the population relied primarily on clean fuels and technology.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita (percent)
facts.fact_text: The annual growth rate of real gross domestic product (GDP) per capita increased from -1.49 % in 2000 to 2.5% in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Unemployment rate of population 15 years of age and older
facts.fact_text: The total unemployment rate increased from 16.5 % in 2000 to 21.3% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population covered by at least a 2G mobile network (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 81.0 % of the population was in range of at least a second-generation (2G) cellular signal

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of urban population living in slums (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the urban population living in slums was 11.9 % in 2014.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual mean levels of fine particulate matter in cities (micrograms per cubic meter)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, the annual population-weighted average mean concentration of fine suspended particles of less than 2.5 microns in diameter (PM2.5) was about 21.22 micrograms per cubic metre. This is above the maximum level for safety set by WHO of 10 micrograms per cubic metre.

facts.seriesTitle: Coverage of protected areas in relation to marine areas (Exclusive Economic Zones) (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2018, 0.22 % of the marine environment under national jurisdiction (up to 200 nautical miles from shore) was under protection.

facts.seriesTitle: Forest area as a proportion of total land area (percent)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of land area covered by forest was approximately 33.28 % in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (percent)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 46.05 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population
facts.fact_text: In 2014, the intentional homicide rate was 19.27 per 100,000 population.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children under 5 years of age whose births have been registered with a civil authority (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2012, there were about 92.0 % of children under age 5 whose births were registered with a civil authority

facts.seriesTitle: Volume of remittances as a proportion of total GCP (percent)
facts.fact_text: In 2016, the inflow of personal remittances was 0.07 % of GDP.

facts.seriesTitle: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services (percent)
facts.fact_text: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services increased from 2.09 % in 1990 to 4.06% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Fixed internet broadband subscriptions per 100 inhabitants
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , fixed-broadband internet penetration reached 17.77 % of the population, up from 0.87% of the population in 2003.
